document-type.layout:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format" xmlns:argo="http://www.navis.com/argo" version="1.1" exclude-result-prefixes="fo"> <xsl:template name="PrintDate"> <SCRIPT language="JavaScript"> document.write(new Date(); </SCRIPT> </xsl:template>
<xsl:output method="xml" version="1.0" omit-xml-declaration="no" indent="yes" /> <!-- root element: --> <xsl:template match="/"> <fo:root> <fo:layout-master-set> <fo:simple-page-master master-name="Damage Report" page-height="11.5in" page-width="8.5in" margin-top="1in" margin-bottom="1in" margin-left="0.75in" margin-right="0.75in"> <fo:region-body /> </fo:simple-page-master> </fo:layout-master-set> <fo:page-sequence master-reference="Damage Report"> <fo:flow flow-name="xsl-region-body"> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" font-weight="bold" space-after="12mm"> </fo:block> <fo:block font-size="12pt"> <fo:table table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="5cm" /> <fo:table-column column-width="5cm" /> <fo:table-body> <xsl:call-template name="argo:docBody" /> <!-- <xsl:apply-templates/> --> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block> </fo:flow> </fo:page-sequence> </fo:root> </xsl:template> <!-- ========================= --> <!-- child element: member --> <!-- ========================= --> <!--xsl:template match="argo:docDescription"> </xsl:template-->
<xsl:template name="argo:docBody"> <xsl:apply-templates /> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="argo:trkTransaction"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm">Chassis# / Owner:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm"> <xsl:value-of select="tranChsNbr" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row /> <fo:table-row > <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt">Container# / Owner:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm"> <xsl:value-of select="tranCtrNbr" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm">Equipment Type:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm"> <xsl:value-of select="tranCtrTypeId" /> <xsl:value-of select="tranGradeId" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row /> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm">Yard Row:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm"> <xsl:value-of select="tranFlexString03" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row /> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm">Trucking Code:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm"> <xsl:value-of select="../argo:truckVisit/tvdtlsTrkCompany" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row /> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm">Trucking Company:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm"> <xsl:value-of select="../argo:truckVisit/tvdtlsTrkCompanyName" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row /> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm">Driver Name:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm"> <xsl:value-of select="../argo:truckVisit/tvdtlsDriverName" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row /> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm">Clerk:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm"> <xsl:value-of select="tranCreator" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row /> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm">Defects:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <xsl:for-each select="argo:tranCtrDmg"> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm"> <xsl:value-of select="dmgitemType" /> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row /> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm">Comments:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <xsl:for-each select="argo:tranCtrDmg"> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm"> <xsl:value-of select="dmgitemDescription" /> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row /> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm">Date:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="12pt" space-after="5mm"> <xsl:value-of select="tranStartTime" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:argo="http://www.navis.com/argo" xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format">
<xsl:output method="text" version="1.0" indent="yes"/>
<xsl:template match="/">
<xsl:text>
</xsl:text>
<xsl:call-template name="argo:docBody"/>
</xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="argo:docDescription"> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template name="argo:docBody"> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="argo:truckVisit">
</xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="argo:trkTransaction">
<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes">
<STX> <ESC>C <ETX> <STX> <ESC>P <ETX> <STX> E1;F1; <ETX> </xsl:text> <!-- Printer Enhancement below section is updated to move the field o50 on each field to print the VVD and Booking number vertically -->
<!-- ***** TERMINAL ID ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H0;o75,25;f0;c25;w28;h28;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranUfvFlexString01"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H65;o350,25;f0;c25;w28;h28;d3,Delivery Receipt <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** TRANSACTION TYPE ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H1;o900,25;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranSubType"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** EquipType&Grade Id ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H2;o900,50;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranCtrTypeId"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** EquipType&Grade Desc***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H60;o900,75;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranGradeId"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Company Legal Form ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H4;o75,75;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranUfvFlexString02"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Page No. ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H3;o75,110;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranUnitFlexString02"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Stop No. ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H66;o300,110;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranFlexString02"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Cons PO#. ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H61;o550,110;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Cons PO#:</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranUnitFlexString01"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Line Separator ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> L62;o75,145;f0;l945;w3;</xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Box1 ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> W5,Box1;o1020,110;f0;l400;h190;w3;</xsl:text>
<!-- ***** TIR No. ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H6;o75,150;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,TIR No:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** OUT Time ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H7;o300,150;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,OUT:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Shipper ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H8;o550,150;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Shipper:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Consignee Signature ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H9;o1040,115;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Consignee Signature</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** TIR No. text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H10;o75,175;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranNbr"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** OUT Time text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H11;o300,175;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="../argo:truckVisit/tvdtlsTrkEndTime"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Shipper text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H12;o550,175;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranShipperName"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Container No. ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H14;o75,225;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Cont.#/Opr:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Chassis No. ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H15;o300,225;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Chassis#/Own:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Genset ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H16;o550,225;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Genset#:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Reefer ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H17;o700,225;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Reefer:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Temp ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H18;o805,225;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Temp:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Seal No. ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H19;o900,225;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Seal No:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Consignee Name ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H63;o1040,225;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Consignee Name</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Container No. text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H22;o75,250;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranCtrNbr"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Chassis No. text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H23;o300,250;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranChsNbr"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Genset text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H24;o550,250;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranCtrAccNbr"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Reefer text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H25;o700,250;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranFlexString08"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Temp text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H26;o825,250;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranFlexString06"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Consignee Name Text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H64;o1040,250;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranConsigneeName"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Seal No. text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H27;o900,250;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranSealNbr1"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** VVD ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H30;o75,300;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,VVD:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** OPD ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H31;o300,300;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,OPD:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Dest City ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H32;o550,300;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Dest City:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Yard Row ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H33;o825,300;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Yard Row:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Service ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H21;o1075,300;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Service:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Booking ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H20;o1200,300;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Bkg/BOL No:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** VVD text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H35;o75,325;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="argo:tranCarrierVisit/cvId"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** OPD text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H36;o300,325;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="argo:tranDischargePoint1/pointId"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Destination text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H37;o550,325;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranDestination"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Yard Row text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H38;o825,325;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranFlexString03"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Service text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H29;o1075,325;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranFlexString07"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Booking text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H28;o1200,325;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranEqoNbr"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Consignee Address text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H39;o75,350;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,Consignee Address:</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranConsigneeId"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** NOTE text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H41;o75,400;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,Cargo Notes:</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranNotes"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H58;o75,415;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranFlexString04"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H59;o75,430;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranFlexString05"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Line Separator ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> L42;o75,465;f0;l1325;w3;</xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Trucking Company ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H43;o75,485;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Trucking Co: </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Trucking Code ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H44;o450,485;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Truck Code: </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Trucker Name ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H45;o650,485;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Trucker Name: </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Cont. Wgt ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H46;o950,485;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Cont. Wgt:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Clerk User ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H47;o1200,485;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Clerk: </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Trucking Company text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H48;o75,515;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="../argo:truckVisit/tvdtlsTrkCompanyName"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Trucking Code text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H49;o450,515;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="../argo:truckVisit/tvdtlsTrkCompany"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Trucker Name text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H50;o650,515;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="../argo:truckVisit/tvdtlsDriverName"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Cont. Wgt text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H51;o950,515;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranCtrGrossWeight"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Clerk User text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H52;o1200,515;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranCreator"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Line Separator ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> L53;o75,560;f0;l1325;w3;</xsl:text>
<!-- ***** DISCLAIMER MESSAGES ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H54;o75,570;f0;c25;w8;h8;d3,I hereby certify that on the date stated, I carefully inspected the equipment described above and that this is a true and correct</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H55;o75,585;f0;c25;w8;h8;d3,report of the results of such an inspection and that possession of such equipment was taken on behalf of the carrier or above</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H56;o75,600;f0;c25;w8;h8;d3,named steamship line at the place and date indicated. The interchange is made subject to the terms and conditions of the currently</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H57;o75,615;f0;c25;w8;h8;d3,effective trailer interchange contractual provisions between named steamship line and the above mentioned carrier.</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- Printer Enhancement to include booking and VVD vertically at the begining of the ticket Start--> <!-- ***** VVD ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H67;o0,525;f1;c25;w16;h16;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="argo:tranCarrierVisit/cvId"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text> <!-- ***** Booking Number ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H68;o0,325;f1;c25;w16;h16;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranEqoNbr"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- Printer Enhancement to include booking and VVD vertically at the begining of the ticket End--> <!-- ***** End of Transfer Block ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> R; <ESC>E1; CAN; <ETX> <STX><ETB><ETX> </xsl:text>
</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:argo="http://www.navis.com/argo" xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format">
<xsl:output method="text" version="1.0" indent="yes"/>
<xsl:template match="/">
<xsl:text>
</xsl:text>
<xsl:call-template name="argo:docBody"/>
</xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="argo:docDescription"> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template name="argo:docBody"> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="argo:truckVisit">
</xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="argo:trkTransaction">
<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes">
<STX> <ESC>C <ETX> <STX> <ESC>P <ETX> <STX> E1;F1; <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Container Number ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H0;o550,125;f0;c25;w24;h24;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranCtrNbr"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Do Not Backload text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H1;o25,200;f0;c25;w70;h70;d3,DO NOT BACKLOAD <ETX></xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Shipper ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H2;o25,400;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Shipper :<ETX></xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Shipper text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H3;o225,400;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranShipperName"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Matson customer service text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H4;o800,400;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Matson Customer Service :<ETX></xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Matson contact number text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H5;o800,440;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,(907) 263-5002 <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Consignee ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H6;o25,440;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Consignee :<ETX></xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Consignee text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H7;o225,440;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranConsigneeName"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Trucking Co. ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H8;o25,480;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Trucking Co.:<ETX></xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Trucking Co. text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H9;o225,480;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="../argo:truckVisit/tvdtlsTrkCompanyName"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** End of Transfer Block ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> R; <ESC>E1; CAN; <ETX> <STX><ETB><ETX> </xsl:text>
</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<!-- ***** Trucker Name ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H45;o650,485;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Trucker Name: </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Cont. Wgt ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H46;o950,485;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Cont. Wgt:</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Clerk User ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H47;o1200,485;f0;c25;w12;h12;d3,Clerk: </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Trucking Company text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H48;o75,515;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="../argo:truckVisit/tvdtlsTrkCompanyName"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Trucking Code text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H49;o450,515;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="../argo:truckVisit/tvdtlsTrkCompany"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Trucker Name text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H50;o650,515;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="../argo:truckVisit/tvdtlsDriverName"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Cont. Wgt text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H51;o950,515;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranCtrGrossWeight"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Clerk User text ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H52;o1200,515;f0;c25;w10;h10;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranCreator"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- ***** Line Separator ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> L53;o75,560;f0;l1325;w3;</xsl:text>
<!-- ***** DISCLAIMER MESSAGES ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H54;o75,570;f0;c25;w8;h8;d3,I hereby certify that on the date stated, I carefully inspected the equipment described above and that this is a true and correct</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H55;o75,585;f0;c25;w8;h8;d3,report of the results of such an inspection and that possession of such equipment was taken on behalf of the carrier or above</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H56;o75,600;f0;c25;w8;h8;d3,named steamship line at the place and date indicated. The interchange is made subject to the terms and conditions of the currently</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H57;o75,615;f0;c25;w8;h8;d3,effective trailer interchange contractual provisions between named steamship line and the above mentioned carrier.</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- Printer Enhancement to include booking and VVD vertically at the begining of the ticket Start-->
<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H66;o0,525;f1;c25;w16;h16;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="argo:tranCarrierVisit/cvId"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> H67;o0,325;f1;c25;w16;h16;d3,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="tranEqoNbr"/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <ETX> </xsl:text>
<!-- Printer Enhancement to include booking and VVD vertically at the begining of the ticket End-->
<!-- ***** End of Transfer Block ***** --> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"> <STX> R; <ESC>E1; CAN; <ETX> <STX><ETB><ETX> </xsl:text> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
